name: Avoid those Rectangles
description:
This is a game that i build to test an idea.

"Avoid Those Rectangles" is a simple but addictive game in which you have to...Avoid some rectangles??

You have onScreen controls to touch them with the finger( On Android devices) or with the Mouse in Windows ( But you can use the Arrows )

So, Lets test it, if you have some question, idea or a proffer you can write me to my itch.io account or to the gmail that is written in the Game's credits.

It is a small game and i am starting in this world, it would be wonderful if you test my Game.

Thank you !!
